workshoptitle: AI Experience - Embedded AI Experience in Fusion Applications - Financial Services Edition

tutorials.title: Introduction: Day in an AI Assisted Life
Lab 1: Use pre-built AI features in Fusion Customer Experience to manage a Sales Opportunity
Lab 2: Provide Feedback for a colleague with built in Generative AI capabilities
Lab 3: Explore Procurement AI Agents and how they streamline the requisition process
Lab 4: Examine how Generative AI simplifies the decision process within Risk Management
Lab 5: Explore Predictive & Generative AI capabilities within Enterprise Performance Management
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
